verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh, who’s like our Jesus? He’s all we desire! His love draws us near—sets our spirits afire! We cannot but love Him—As one we proclaim: “Lord Jesus, we love Thee—exalt Thy dear name!”{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Jesus, our Jesus, how can we express Thy dearness, so precious, and Thy loveliness? When we see Thy beauty, all else fades away— All shadows must flee at the breaking of day!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
